name: Korniks Arena
description:
Korniks Arena is an arena shooter game, where you help mighty ent defeat dirty and cunning Korniks (bark beetles), who are trying to destroy forest in the arena.

Dirty Korniks used dark dice magic to give themselves various powerups.

Dice magic is random, so one minute they can be very strong, other minute they will be easier to defeat.

Our ent is also able to use dice magic to empower himself, becoming literal god, but just for a moment. Use these oportunities to defeat the Korniks!

Controls:

  • W,S,A,D - movement
  • mouse movement - look around
  • mouse left click - shoot projectile
  • space - jump
  • left shift - sprint
